attributes.action: arrange for a new National Anthem to be composed for the reason stated below.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The final verse of the National Anthem goes as follows:

6. Lord grant that Marshal Wade
May by thy mighty aid
Victory bring
May he sedition hush
And like a torrent rush
Rebellious scots to crush
God save the King 

We believe the National Anthem to represent the entire United Kingdom so why in this day and age are we still singing these lyrics.
